UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Host defence peptides from the skin glands of the Australian blue mountains tree-frog Litoria citropa. Solution structure of the antibacterial peptide citropin 1.1.
Literature.Author: Wegener KL, Wabnitz PA, Carver JA, Bowie JH, Chia BC, Wallace JC, Tyler MJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus cereus(MIC=>100µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=>100µg/ml),Leuconostoc lactis(MIC=>50µg/ml),Listeria innocua(MIC=>100µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=>100µg/ml),Pasteurella multocida(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=>100µg/ml),Streptococcus uberis(MIC=100µg/ml)
